Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: WB #103 buses will operate via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 103rd/Leavitt.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at California/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Bryn Mawr & California, due to street blockage near California/Catalpa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Bryn Mawr, then resume their normal route at California, due to street blockage near California/Catalpa.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Vernon
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Cottage Grove, 76th, King Drive & 75th, due to fire department activity near 75th/Vernon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Cottage Grove, 76th, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to fire department activity near 75th/Vernon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/Emerald
ShortDescription: 8A S. Halsted buses temp. rrtd NB: Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, Halsted; SB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, Halsted; due to street blockage near Halsted/Emerald

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Halsted/Emerald.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks at Cicero.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
